review: Me & my husband love it! It works perfect never had a problem. Set up was super easy. We are even going to buy one for our bedroom soon!
author: bama clark

review: The fire stick performed as expected.  Easy to install and works great with my iphone app!
author: Ross D Contella

review: I really wasn't expecting this to have a power cord as well, but it works fine and doesn't annoy me.
author: Valerie

review: Got the Amazon Fire TV stick as part of a free promotion for sling TV and I love it for the sling TV and slingbox apps.  There are lots of app options for the Amazon fire stick that are not available on Apple TV.
author: Matthew Spaulding

review: The Fire Stick itself works great.  I just wish they would have more 'up-to-date' FREE movies for Prime subscribers.  They are some, but not a lot.  Other than that...the Fire Stick is a great price and works great.  Has many apps (pandora, etc.) which is great if you don't have a 'smart tv' to start with.
author: S. Hawkins "Dallas"

review: I just love it...best thing amazon has invented And it takes up no space. I am able to watch so many movies now. Haven't played the games yet but will do. So satisfied definitely recommend and the price is awesome.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works very well. Everyone in my family is loving this technology. Took way too long to ship (1month), Soo I give 4.5 stars.
author: JGo420

review: Love this!  it was on back order but glad I bought it.  Easy to set up.
author: drez
